articles.author: Eric Reguly
articles.title: Allies consider sending warplanes to Poland if Warsaw delivers Soviet-era planes to Ukraine - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Poland maintains several dozen old MiG and Sukhoi jets that can be flown by Ukraine pilots, but would want US- or European-built planes in return
articles.content: The United States, Britain and other Western allies are working on plans to transfer Polish fighter or ground attack jets to Kyiv in an attempt to prevent Russia from gaining total air superiority ov… [+4832 chars]

articles.title: Euro falls vs major currencies, dollar jumps; Ukraine conflict intensifies - CNA
articles.description: NEW YORK :     The euro fell against major currencies and the U.S. dollar rallied on Friday as worries increased over the impact of the escalating Ukraine-Russia conflict, especially on Europe's growth outlook.The euro fell below $1.10 against the dollar, hit…

articles.author: Zia Weise, Zosia Wanat
articles.title: The EU’s plan to cure its Russian gas addiction - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Brussels is considering mandatory minimum gas storage levels and plans to boost renewables capacity.
articles.content:
The European Commission has drawn up a 10-point plan to reduce the blocs dependence on Russian gas, according to a draft communication obtained by POLITICO. 
The war in Ukraine has added urgency to … [+3333 chars]
